title: High Price Of Cancer Treatment Drugs Is 'Unsustainable,' Doctor Says
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish speaks with Dr. Leonard Saltz, chief of Gastrointestinal Oncology at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, about his concerns regarding the high price of cancer treatment drugs.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
